replies.body:
Rengar hits lvl 6
{{champion:107}} OMW top bro
{{champion:420}} R
{{champion:420}} Double kill
{{champion:107}} /all Report Nasus feeding
{{champion:75}} WTF, she is 2 and 0, all kills she has are from this gank
{{champion:107}} /all And he is also toxic
{{champion:107}} I thought you already baited her ult wtf

You can get stacks from her tentacles.

Otherwise yeah the doggo gets fucked by the nature of Illaoi’s kit.

Rengar is mis-playing.  Having a huge power-spike at level 6 doesn’t mean that he can’t gank before then: Illaoi is harassing Nasus under his tower.  

He could literally walk up river, take down her tentacles, and walk toward her.  Without her tentacles, Illaoi has no sustain or crowd control and would have to run back, flashing Rengar’s bola.
Illaoi E is just op.

> [{quoted}](name=Kaioken Attack,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-11T11:50:28.918+0000)
>
> Illaoi E is just op.

Given how she can spam it, I agree. Illaoi hands down has to be one of the most unfun top lane match ups. Kite hard and flash dodge E, otherwise get bent over.

I'm just gonna copy and paste what I said on another thread.

Idk why people say Illaoi is good vs Nasus. I have literally never lost vs Illaoi as Nasus and her tentacles give you free stacks. If you dodge her e she can't poke you and you can free farm and stack her tentacles for an easy 400+ stacks at 20 minutes. If anything, Nasus counters Illaoi lol he fucking shits on her.

Illaoi countering Nasus is 100% false and yet people try to argue otherwise. I have played the matchup countless times from both sides, and Illaoi is one of the worst champs to pick against Nasus.

Nasus beats Illaoi if Illoai plays the lane normally

But if Illoai plays hyper aggressive and basically tries to all in with W/Q at level 2 and then abuse the health advantage from this, she will win the lane.

The counter to that is jungle pressure from Nasus's jungler, but in solo queue that is a dice roll

> [{quoted}](name=DeusVult,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-03-11T04:02:40.899+0000)
>
> Nasus beats Illaoi if Illoai plays the lane normally
> 
> But if Illoai plays hyper aggressive and basically tries to all in with W/Q at level 2 and then abuse the health advantage from this, she will win the lane.
> 
> The counter to that is jungle pressure from Nasus's jungler, but in solo queue that is a dice roll

Nasus can just wither her and walk away lmao. In no scenario does Nasus lose this lane.
bs if you go for the tentacles since you melee is free e from illaoi you got the tentacle but there goes 1/2 of your hp

> [{quoted}](name=RedHakann,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-11T12:52:15.284+0000)
>
> bs if you go for the tentacles since you melee is free e from illaoi you got the tentacle but there goes 1/2 of your hp

You dodge her e. I know it may sound crazy but it IS possible to dodge skillshots. If you dodge her e she literally can't damage you without her ult.
i know this sound crazy but while you auto you cant dodge cuz your champion stand still so you went vs bad illaoi

you can dodge actually, it will just cancel the autoattack.

and funnily enough, waiting to auto again takes less time than it will take illaoi to throw another e.

> [{quoted}](name=RedHakann,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-11T17:15:57.703+0000)
>
> i know this sound crazy but while you auto you cant dodge cuz your champion stand still so you went vs bad illaoi

You bait her e out and then go for the tentacles lmaooo you sound bronze
when you talk is not like the other player cant outplay you, and she can E  as close as possible to miss less E

> [{quoted}](name=Salamencę,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-11T01:52:33.934+0000)
>
> I'm just gonna copy and paste what I said on another thread.
> 
> Idk why people say Illaoi is good vs Nasus. I have literally never lost vs Illaoi as Nasus and her tentacles give you free stacks. If you dodge her e she can't poke you and you can free farm and stack her tentacles for an easy 400+ stacks at 20 minutes. If anything, Nasus counters Illaoi lol he fucking shits on her.
> 
> Illaoi countering Nasus is 100% false and yet people try to argue otherwise. I have played the matchup countless times from both sides, and Illaoi is one of the worst champs to pick against Nasus.

I always wins against Nasus lol 
The only problem I always have is Cho, but Cho eats everyone right now so its fine
The irony in their names "Ganks4Dayz" and "1v1MeScrub".
Shouldn't tentacles give stacks?
They do.
Then Nasus should be quite happy
but its not gold, and you lose a good chunk of your health to get those to show up. the stax are a consolation prize by getting chunked to get further chunked.
welcome to being countered!

> [{quoted}](name=CrazFight ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RIibW7sq,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-10T22:17:56.847+0000)
>
> https://i.redd.it/9r1zfrp5mqk01.jpg

But but but

Illaoi passive gives nasus stacks.


I’m dying.

Wow... This comic followed her release.

Stay ~~original~~ repetitive, M&G.
